text: Good morning, Brooksville Residents! Don't forget to support our local businesses!
Urgent: Lost dog near the old mill. Please keep an eye out. Reward if found!
Reminder: Road closures this weekend for the Brooksville Marathon.
Looking for volunteers at the community center this Friday. Anyone available?
Hey folks, I'm organizing a tool swap meet next month. Bring tools you don't need and swap them!
Can anyone recommend a good electrician? Need some work done on my house.
Jane, I saw your post about carpentry work. I might need some help next week.
Does anyone have experience with grant writing? Our local library needs assistance.

Jane, please make sure Tom knows that we have a supportive community here. We're all here to help each other. His situation as an undocumented immigrant is tough, but we'll do all we can to prevent his deportation and keep him safe.
I'm giving away some old gardening tools. They're still in good condition if anyone is interested.
